Neko-chan -Silvered Tongue
hide bio
PM . Follow . Favorite
Joined 06-02-01, id: 76156, Profile Updated: 11-16-17
Author has written 241 stories for Dragon Ball Z, Gundam Wing/AC, Anime X-overs, Lord of the Flies, Labyrinth, Rurouni Kenshin, Song of the Lioness, Utena, Digimon, Harry Potter, Fushigi Yuugi, Yu-Gi-Oh, Mediator, Unicorn Chronicles, Lord of the Rings, Vampire Hunter, Shakespeare, Magic Knight Rayearth/魔法騎士レイアース, Dragon Knights, Phantom of the Opera, Fanfiction Poetry, Video Girl Ai, Card Captor Sakura, Bible, X/1999, Weiss Kreuz, Gargoyles, Yami no Matsuei, Fruits Basket, Gravitation, Saiyuki, Misc. Movies, Pet Shop of Horrors, Loveless, V for Vendetta, Code Geass, Kuroshitsuji, Zenon, Shonen Onmyouji, Durarara!!/デュラララ!!, and Artemis Fowl.

PLEASE READ: After much deliberation, I have decided to leave ff.net. I will not be pulling my stories from this site, but please be advised that they will not be updated. THEY ARE ALSO NOT UP FOR ADOPTION. AT ALL. Please do not ask. If you would like to continue reading my writing, you can find me at ao3 and on Tumblr under the username 'rightsidethru.'
